general.question: What is an NFT?
general.answer: An NFT (Non-Fungible Token) is a unique digital asset that represents ownership of a specific item or piece of content on the blockchain. In our platform, NFTs represent unique voice recordings and audio content.

general.question: How do I get started?
general.answer: To get started, connect your wallet, create a profile, and you can begin recording and minting your voice NFTs. Visit our quick start guide for detailed instructions.

technical.question: Which wallets are supported?
technical.answer: We support MetaMask, WalletConnect, and other major Ethereum wallets. Make sure your wallet is compatible with ERC-721 tokens.

nfts.question: How do I create a voice NFT?
nfts.answer: Use our voice recording feature, customize your NFT metadata, set your price, and mint your NFT. The process is simple and guided.
